short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the grammar and rewrite the sentence using ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grafix is the ultimate Chrome extension for anyone looking to improve their writing effortlessly! 

Powered by OpenAI's advanced ChatGPT technology, Grafix analyzes your text in real-time and provides grammatically correct, polished, and professional suggestions within seconds. 

Whether you're drafting an email, composing an essay, or updating your social media status,
 Grafix ensures your writing is always accurate and effective.

Why Install Grafix?
Accurate Grammar Correction: Instantly fix grammatical errors, typos, and awkward phrasing in your text with the power of ChatGPT. Grafix ensures your message is always clear and professional.

Save Time and Effort: Stop worrying about grammar mistakes or proofreading. Grafix does the hard work for you, saving you time and ensuring your writing shines every time.

Easy to Use: Simply type or paste your text into the Grafix input box, click the "Correct Grammar" button, and watch as your improved text is generated instantly.

Secure and Private: Your API key and prompts are securely stored in the extension options. Grafix respects your privacy and ensures a secure connection to ChatGPT.

One-Click Copy: Copy your corrected text instantly with a single click, making it easy to paste into emails, documents, or social media posts.
